rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that welcomes visitors with a Vastu-aligned layout promoting positive energy flow.
An expansive living room featuring Art Deco detailing and modern amenities; positioned to face the east for auspicious sunlight.
A dining area integrated with the living space offering a cohesive Art Deco design, ensuring clear sightlines.
Modern kitchen with efficient workspace and compliance with Vastu guidelines for energy circulation. Equipped with wheelchair-accessible cabinetry.
Primary master bedroom incorporating Art Deco elegance and privacy; designed to be wheelchair accessible.
Secondary bedroom with comfortable design elements and Vastu-aligned positioning for balance.
Additional bedroom ensuring ample space; optimized for energy flow according to local norms.
Well-ventilated bathroom with accessibility features and Art Deco fixtures in line with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible main entrance aligned with the entrance hall for easy access.
Large window to enhance natural light in the living room per Vastu guidelines.
Sliding door between kitchen and dining area for seamless transition.

notes.description: The layout aligns with Vastu principles to ensure positive energy flow, such as facing the living room eastwards and proper positioning of entryways.
All door openings are designed to be wheelchair accessible with no obstacles; thresholds are minimized.
